snippet.title: Resurrecting HotS - Resurgence of the Storm Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Update: we've hit our goal for donations - development will continue for the foreseeable future. Thank you for your support!

Discord: https://discord.gg/QjdgCQPWtA
Release Notes: https://docs.google.com/document/d/16tW-OAyT7uXdrDB8v8fHffrDqHXto9uhffOKa-3in30
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/resurgenceofthestorm
Boosty: https://boosty.to/resurgenceofthestorm

Resurgence of the Storm (RotS) is a recreation of Heroes of the Storm, in the form of a playable mod for Starcraft 2.
It has been in development for over 4 years, and is finally being released to the public!

0:00 What Is Resurgence
1:03 New Heroes
1:43 Reworks and New Talents
3:20 What RotS Isn't
3:38 Roadmap
4:29 Development
5:06 Donations
5:29 Download Instructions

Credits:
Video voiced by:  @MindHawkHotS 
Video edited by: @Quazey
